name: part_002
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage1 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [00xeNL3vdQo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Slideshow of fan messages and illustrations for "hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment".
Attention notice for concert visitors regarding lighting effects and cheering rules.
Promotional visual for "hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment".
Commercial for Bandai Candy's "hololive production wafers vol.3".

subtitles.original:
Attention
ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
声出し応援 OK です

For Visitors
